articles.author: Katherine Lewin
articles.title: NodThera touts potential weight loss effect of NLRP3 inhibitors - Endpoints News
articles.description: NodThera is moving its NLRP3 inhibitors into the clinic after preclinical data showed it reversed obesity and inflammation in mice in a study that compared it against Novo Nordisk’s Wegovy. In the trial, mice receiving NT-0796, NodThera’s lead candidate, lost…
articles.content: NodThera is mov­ing its NL­RP3 in­hibitors in­to the clin­ic af­ter pre­clin­i­cal da­ta showed it re­versed obe­si­ty and in­flam­ma­tion in mice in a study that com­pared it against No­vo Nordisk’s… [+446 chars]

articles.author: Liam Pritchett
articles.title: 17 Iron-Rich Vegan Recipes - Plant Based News
articles.description: Iron is an essential part of any healthy, balanced diet, and iron-rich vegan recipes could help you boost your intake
articles.content: Iron is an essential mineral for almost all living organisms. It supports a range of integral metabolic processes in the human body, including blood oxygenation and the conversion of blood sugar into… [+9997 chars]
